description:
The theme of the next round is Yakisoba bread, and the twist is that challengers this round will cook the yakisoba. Kazuma, however, is a terrible cook, so Mr. Matsushiro recruits an old friend to teach Kazuma and Kawachi about the way of noodles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Noodlicious!! The Pitfalls of Yakisoba Bread!
เส้นอาหย่อยยย กับหลุมพรางขนมปังยากิโซบะ!
美麺ーッ!! 焼きそばパンの落とし穴!
